title: Financial and legal professionals see the value in generative AI, according to a study
description: More than 75% of lawyers and accountants believe AI tools can enhance their work. Here's the rest of the breakdown.

title: Apple just released iOS 16.5.1 with security fixes
description: The Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch also received an update on Wednesday to fix two actively exploited vulnerabilities.

title: Amazon to test escrow service in digital money pilot
description: The e-commerce giant will work with fintech players on a trial to test the use of "purpose-bound" digital money, where merchants will receive payment only after customers receive their purchases.

title: More developers are coding with AI than you think, Stack Overflow survey finds
description: With 90,000 responses to the company's annual survey, here's where developers are leaning in the generative AI debate.

title: What is Chromebook X? Google's new line of flagship laptops is coming soon
description: The Chromebook X program ushers in a new era of premium hardware running Google's ChromeOS.

title: Do you use Snapchat's AI chatbot? Here's the data it's pulling from you
description: As Snapchat's ChatGPT-powered AI surpasses 150 million users, here's what data it's gathered so far.

title: How to use Canva AI to turn any photo into a professional headshot
description: Canva's AI-powered Magic Edit tool will save you a trip to the photography studio (and some money too).

title: Save up to $330 on Amazon Fire TVs now, before Prime Day
description: Prime members can already access early Prime Day sales on Amazon -- and there are some great TV deals available.

title: This is by far the most convenient power strip I've ever used
description: The Baseus PowerCombo Tower 65W is a great, unobtrusive way to keep your devices powered, without having to depend on a bunch of adapters.

title: I replaced my phone's weather app with this $340 forecasting station. Here's why
description: For the most accurate weather forecasting, this smart hub is as good as your local weatherman.

title: Philips Hue users are getting long overdue customization upgrades. Here's what's new
description: If you're already using Hue motion sensors and/or multiple lights, things are about to get better.

title: A thorny question: Who owns code, images, and narratives generated by AI?
description: This is still a hazy area, a new Stanford study suggests. Prepare for a lot of litigation.

title: I tested the Tesla Cybertruck of robot mowers - and it's as futuristic as you'd expect

title: Otter.ai's new AI chatbot will automate your next steps after meetings

title: How to share a printer on Linux with CUPS and Samba
description: Some Linux distributions make sharing printers far easier than others. If your distribution doesn't include a GUI for printer sharing, you'll have to use the command line.
